DOC.brief_title: Alendronate Prevents Microarchitectural Deterioration Trabecular Bone Early Postmenopausal Women
DOC.detailed_description: This randomize , double-blind , 24-month study . Fifty-five postmenopausal woman , age range 45-65 year , low bone density recruit , half subject receive alendronate + 2800 IU vitamin D weekly , half receive placebo + 2800 IU vitamin D weekly . All study subject receive supplemental calcium 1000 mg/day + Vitamin D 400 IU/day . Measurements microarchitecture make wrist , ankle , hip , change trabecular bone assess 0 , 12 24 month . Markers bone turnover bone mineral density ( BMD ) use characterize cohort postmenopausal change bone turnover density .
